name: Neon Dice (spairus)
description:
Have you ever craved more RNG in your speedruns? Then Neon Dice is for you!

Optimize your moves and improve your time in this speedrun-sim that tests both your mechanical and strategic skill!

  • Customize your dice- generated course, and optimize for time
  • Edit on the fly! About to fall? Put some ground beneath your feet!
  • You can make your own way, and navigate it too!
  • Can you discover all the hidden movement-techs? (Shhh! Speedrunners only!)

Known Issues: The reroll button makes the game unstable. If something goes wrong, just restart the game!

Note: Also, you can exploit it to get a better time, at a risk of crashing the game. The true speedrun experience! Speed requires risks, after all

Game Manual: Editing mode:
  • Click on any platform to move it to another space
  • You can also click on another platform instead to switch them
  • You cannot edit a given space more than once!
  • You can enter Editing mode at ANY time!
Play mode:
  • AD or Directional Keys to move
  • SPACE to Jump
  • SHIFT to Dash
  • TAB to toggle Editing mode

Make your movements count!

Don't forget to screenshot your best time, and show it off to your friends!

       Made and submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Roll of the Dice)
